name: Memory Match
description: Match pairs of cards to improve your visual memory and concentration skills.

name: Pattern Recognition
description: Identify and complete complex patterns to enhance pattern recognition abilities.

name: Focus Training
description: Maintain focus on target elements while ignoring distractions.

name: Speed Math
description: Solve mathematical problems quickly to boost mental calculation speed.

name: Word Puzzles
description: Solve word-based puzzles to improve vocabulary and linguistic reasoning.

name: Spatial Reasoning
description: Manipulate 3D objects mentally to enhance spatial intelligence.

name: Working Memory
description: Hold and manipulate information in your mind simultaneously.

name: Attention Switch
description: Switch attention between different tasks to improve cognitive flexibility.

name: Number Sequence
description: Complete number sequences to enhance logical reasoning skills.

name: Reaction Time
description: Test and improve your reaction time with visual and auditory stimuli.
